field_provus_body.value:
As the legislative body, the City Council is responsible for setting City policy through ordinances and resolutions, adopting the City’s budget and enforce laws and regulations.. The Council also has sole responsibility for adopting the City’s budget.

The Council is comprised of elected officials, serving no more than two consecutive terms representing the interests of the residents and work towards the overall betterment of the city.

Regular council meetings are held to serve as a platform for community engagement. where residents can voice their concerns, opinions, and ideas. Council members are tasked with advocating for the cities interests while collaborating with other government entities, community organizations to enhance the quality of life for residents within Meridian County.
